org.cloudgraph.hbase.filter

Interface HBaseFilterAssembler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Assembler
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PredicateFilterAssembler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BinaryPrefixColumnFilterAssembler, ColumnPredicateFilterAssembler, ColumnPredicateVisitor, FilterHierarchyAssembler, FilterListAssembler, FuzzyRowKeyScanAssembler, GraphFetchColumnFilterAssembler, InitialFetchColumnFilterAssembler, MultiColumnPredicateFilterAssembler, MultiColumnPredicateVisitor, PredicateColumnFilterAssembler, PredicateRowFilterAssembler, PredicateVisitor, RowPredicateVisitor, StatefullBinaryPrefixColumnFilterAssembler

    public interface HBaseFilterAssembler
extends Assembler
    Common interface for HBase row and column filter assemblers.

    HBase filters may be collected into lists using FilterList each with a MUST_PASS_ALL or MUST_PASS_ONE (logical) operator. Lists may then be assembled into hierarchies used to represent complex expression trees filtering either rows or columns in HBase.

    Since:
    0.5
    Author:
    Scott Cinnamond
